post_title: SOLD: T206 Rube Marquard (HOF) - Portrait w/ Sweet Caporal 350, factory 25 back
post_content:
This card entered my collection many years ago via a board member. Now it is time for it to move on to someone else. 

Rube used to live in a PSA 3 plastic house but was freed from it long ago. He is looking quite well after all these years and can still be classified as VG-ish. See images below to help you form an opinion on condition. PM or post in thread with any questions or requests.

Price is $OLD

PayPal FF preferred. If PayPal G&S add $10. Shipping and insurance is included.
